short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks a specific link on certain websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automates the process of obtaining points/rewards on "safelist" sites like 100PercentClicks.com. Automate website link clicks and Gmail email link clicks. Simply navigate to the website, authenticate, and click RUN.

WARNING: If the plugin is running it will control your browser. Make sure not to interact with your browser while it is running. This could result in unexpected behavior.
